name: majestic-million-feed
label: Majestic Million Feed
description:
Majestic crawls the web and analyzes the data to create a huge Link Intelligence dataset describing how the world wide web links together. Use the Majestic Million connector to ingest the top known websites as 'good' indicators. This connector facilitates automated operations related to fetching the list indicators and ingestion of daily threat feeds.

This connector has a dependency on the Threat Intel Management Solution Pack. Install the Solution Pack before enabling ingestion of Threat Feeds from this source.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Domain Records
operations.description: Retrieve or download top one million good domains from Majestic Million.

Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.title: Reputation
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.name: reputation
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.tooltip: Select the reputation to be set for the feeds.
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.description:
Select the reputation to be set for the feeds. You can choose from the following options:  
Good, Suspicious, Malicious, No Reputation Available, TBD.

Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.title: TLP
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.name: tlp
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.tooltip: Select the TLP to be set for the feeds.
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.description:
Select the TLP to be set for the feeds. You can choose from the following options:  
Red, Amber, Green, White.
